text: Provide a reusable type-aware linked list data structure.

success_criteria.text: Get a pointer to the beginning of the list.
Get a pointer to the end of the list.
Add an item to the front of the list.
Add an item to the back of the list.
Delete an item to the front of the list.
Delte an item to the back of the list.
Delete a given node from the list.
